trans-unit.resname: G07·1 | Ravenous Baloth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.

trans-unit.source: "All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive."\n—Elvish refugee
trans-unit.target: "All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive."\n—Elvish refugee

trans-unit.resname: G07·2 | Cunning Wish | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may reveal an instant card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: You may reveal an instant card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: The foolish wish for that which they desire. The cunning wish for that which they require.
trans-unit.target: The foolish wish for that which they desire. The cunning wish for that which they require.

trans-unit.resname: G07·3 | Yawgmoth's Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: G07·3 | Yawgmoth's Will | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.
trans-unit.target: If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

trans-unit.source: Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them.
trans-unit.target: Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them.

trans-unit.resname: G07·5 | Decree of Justice | Card Name
G07·5 | Decree of Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

trans-unit.resname: G07·5 | Decree of Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

trans-unit.resname: G07·5 | Decree of Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When you cycle CARDNAME, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: When you cycle CARDNAME, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
